Accelerate your path and close more deals with Relaso CRM

Relaso offers a seamless all-in-one solution, enabling effortless pipeline management, efficient deal management, and relationship nurturing—all from an intuitive platform.
Key features include:

Easy Integration

Seamlessly connect Relaso with your existing tools and platforms, ensuring a smooth workflow without disruption to your current processes.

Automated Workflows

Automate repetitive tasks to save valuable time, boosting efficiency and allowing you to focus on more important aspects of your business.

Customizable Dashboard

Personalize your dashboard to align with your specific workflow and business needs, allowing you to manage key insights and tasks more efficiently.

Advanced Analytics

Access in-depth reporting and analytics tools that offer powerful insights into your business performance, helping you make informed decisions.

Enhance your business efficiency with Relaso suite of products.

Whether you're looking to optimize customer relationship management (CRM), streamline operations, or enhance sales and support workflows, our products are designed for seamless integration and maximum efficiency.

Relaso CRM

A comprehensive platform for managing customer relationships, streamlining communication, and business growth through advanced tools designed to improve efficiency, and customer satisfaction.

Relaso Hospitech

Empowering healthcare equipment distributors with seamless lead management, automated workflows, and real-time insights.

Relaso Clinics

Designed for clinics to manage patient appointments, streamline interactions, and improve overall service delivery, ensuring a seamless and efficient healthcare experience.

Relaso Examination

Automate the entire exam process—from candidate registration to result publication. Seamless experiences for administrators, evaluators, and candidates alike.

Relaso HelpDesk

Exceptional customer support with efficient ticket management. Track, prioritize, and resolve queries faster while enhancing customer satisfaction and boosting team productivity effortlessly.

Relaso for Law Firms

A specialized solution for legal professionals, offering tools to manage cases, streamline billing, and organize documentation for improved productivity and client service.
